reviewText: Bought this for my 4 yr grandson and he loves it.  He loves every Thomas movie and is crazy for anything Thomas.  I can always count on Thomas movies to keep him engrossed.

My boys love Thomas & Friends and while we have tons of Thomas DVDs, they have yet to get sick of them.  What I love about the new Thomas DVDs is that they are in CG animation, which is bright, colorful and really kid-friendly (my boys are not big fans of the original Thomas episodes.)  This DVD features four great new episodes and includes Thomas and all his friends.  It also features great lessons such as working together, friendship and learning through exploring.
Not at all what i wanting..nothing like PBS series
Good DVDs for kids. Thank you.
Great XMAS present in which my child loved it
Purchased for my granddaughter when she was two.  She's almost 4 and still enjoys it.  You can't go wrong with a Thomas the Train video!  The tape arrived in a very timely manner.
My son loves this movie. He is a huge Thomas the train fan. I was very happy with the speed and quality of the movie when we received it.
We love the Thomas and friends collection - Such a great kid's show! Our 3 year old would watch these movies 24 hours a day if we'd let him.
